channel.title: Dreamscape HP Bug Fix!
channel.description:
Super duper easy Lol!
In client.java find:
[CODE]getPA().sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[24] + "", 4017);[/CODE]
Change to
[CODE]//getPA().sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[24] + "", 4017);[/CODE]
Enjoyyyy <3 Rep+/Thanks wouldn't go astray as alot of people were asking for this.
- Credits - [url=http://google.com/members/01053/]http://google.com/members/01053/[/url]
For finding he asked me to post because he got banned for 4 days for the stupidest reason ever, which was Infraction build up or something lolol.
Easy fix but I doubt anyone would of found + there was help threads.
YES I KNOW IT'S A SNIPPET COULDN'T FIND THE SNIPPITS SECTION MOD MOVE IF YOU WANT LOL.
[size=8pt]VIDEO[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WQHhHtUt26M[/youtube]&feature=youtu.be
^ Originally posted on a help thread @ run3-s3r3r
